data.title: Peter Goddard on LinkedIn: #executivesearch #cfo
data.meta_description: After almost nine years I am moving on from Omera.  Whilst I am leaving behind some great friends; it is time for a new challenge in the New Year in the  worldâ€¦ | 75 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

After almost nine years I am moving on from Omera. Whilst I am leaving behind some great friends; it is time for a new challenge in the New Year in the world of #executivesearch and #cfo appointments with an amazing new opportunity that has come my way. It's time to learn something new whilst continuing to be responsive, honest and giving to both clients and candidates alike. My mobile will remain +61403329070 and I look forward to reconnecting with you in 2024.
